attributes.action: Investigate why the price of oil decreases by nearly 10dollars per barrel but the price of petrol increases,also the record profits posted by petrol companies year on year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although I believe the tax on fuel is very high it beggars belief that fuel companies put fuel prices up as soon as the oil price goes up yet we never see it reduced when the price goes down. Fuel companies are posting record profits year on year and we as motorists are being asked to pay more money again.Gordon Brown reduces the TAX and then the fuel companies increase by the same rate.SOMETHING MUST BE DONE
